title: Job Openings at Krystal Medical Centre
content:
Krystal Medical Centre is a leading health organization that focuses on health care, provides and promote continuity of care for clients at home, at the hospital. We care and God cures.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Female Receptionist / Front Desk Officer

Job Location: Magodo, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Welcome patients and visitors warmly, creating a positive first impression.
	Maintain a calm, organized, and patient-friendly reception area.
	Collect and accurately update patient details in medical records.
	Log daily registrations and maintain digital backups using Microsoft Excel.
	Handle phone calls professionally and manage appointment scheduling.
	Coordinate patient flow across hospital departments.
	Assist patients with forms, documentation, and general inquiries.
	Process billing, payments, and receipts efficiently.
	Offer reassurance and support to patients in distress or emergencies.
	Keep reception and front desk areas neat, stocked, and functional.
	Liaise discreetly with medical staff and departments.
	Generate front desk reports and maintain proper documentation.
	Uphold strict confidentiality with patient and hospital information.


Qualifications & Requirements


	OND / HND in Business Administration, Accounting, or related field.
	1–2 years of relevant work experience (experience in a healthcare setting is an added advantage).
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite and Healthcare Management Systems.
	Strong interpersonal and communication skills (verbal and written).
	Customer-facing experience with excellent organizational and multitasking ability.
	Presentable, smart, detail-oriented, and a fast learner.
	Team player with a proactive and positive attitude.
	Must reside in or around Magodo, Shangisha, Ketu, Ikosi, Berger, Ikeja, or nearby areas.
	Must be available to start immediately.


Application Closing Date: 9th September, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their Applications and copies of their credentials to: Krystalmedicalcentre@gmail.com with the Job Position applied for as the subject of the email.

 

 

2.) Community Health Extension Worker (CHEW)

Job Location: Magodo Phase 2, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	We are seeking a dedicated Community Health Extension Worker (CHEW) to join our team.
	The ideal candidate will provide quality patient care, support physicians, and ensure accurate medical documentation.


Key Responsibilities


	Monitor patients’ conditions and assess their needs to provide the best possible care and advice.
	Perform routine procedures such as blood pressure checks, administering injections, and updating patient charts.
	Administer prescribed medications and treatments in line with physicians’ instructions.
	Provide prompt care in emergency situations.
	Assist in minor surgical procedures when required.
	Maintain accurate medical records and reports.
	Ensure compliance with hospital policies, safety, and infection control standards.
	Participate in community health outreach programs when necessary.


Requirements


	Minimum of OND/HND in Community Health Extension or related field.
	At least 2 years of relevant work experience.
	Must be duly registered with the appropriate regulatory body.
	Valid practising licence is required.
	Experience working in a pharmacy is an added advantage.
	Must reside in or around Magodo, Shangisha, Ketu, or nearby areas.


Salary
N70,000 Monthly.

Application Closing Date: 22nd September, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should submit a copy of their updated CV, Photocopies of academic/professional certificates & a Photocopy of a valid practising licence to: krystalmedicalcentre@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

 

3.) Medical Officer

Job Location: Magodo Phase 2, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Job Shift: Two (2) days on, Four (4) days off

Job Description


	Evaluate patients and provide appropriate medical treatment for various illnesses and injuries.
	Ensuring that patient care and is optimal and is in adherence to the clinical guidelines and quality standards.
	Document all patient evaluations, treatments, medications and transactions according to company policies and procedure.
	Performing inpatient and outpatient review with initial assessment and management.
	Supervise Medical Assistants to ensure compliance with all applicable regulations.
	Evaluate the effectiveness of current care methods and procedures and suggest improvements.


Requirements


	M.B.B.S. or equivalent.
	Minimum of 2 years of Post NYSC experience in medical practice.
	Must possess a valid practising license with the. Medical and Dental Council of Nigeria.
	Proficiency with the use of the computer.
	Candidates must possess NYSC discharge Certificate or an Exemption letter.
	Proficient with Healthcare Management Systems and Microsoft Office Suite.
	Excellent problem-solving and clinical decision-making. skills.
	Good time management and organisational skills.
	Good communication skills, both written and verbal.
	Excellent organisational and multi-tasking skills.


Salary
N500,000 Monthly.

Application Closing Date: 28th September, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should submit a copy of their applications, including telephone numbers, email addresses, and copies of credentials to: krystalmedicalcentre@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Software Engineer Backend (NodeJS) Job at Youverify




        
    

        
        Youverify is a leading provider of digital identity verification, AML and fraud solutions, dedicated to helping businesses automate and streamline their customer onboarding processes while ensuring compliance with regulatory requirements. We leverage cutting-edge technologies like artificial intelligence and machine learning to offer accurate and efficient verification solutions that enhance customer trust and operational efficiency. We aim to reduce fraud and support businesses across various industries, including banking, fintech, telecommunications, and e-commerce.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Software Engineer Backend (NodeJS)

Job Location: Lagos
     

            
    



Responsibilities


	Design and implement new features and enhancements using NodeJS
	Fix bugs assigned during the sprint planning process
	Design, innovate, and solve complex problems inherent in operating a high scale classifieds platform
	Play a key role in reviewing and approving the work of your peers as part of the software development process
	Interact with product owners, partners, and business stakeholders to understand and develop requirements
	Debugging and Improvement of existing systems
	Expand our micro-services architecture
	Management of all 3rd party tool relationships and integrations from a technical aspect. i.e. SMS providers, Email, APIs, Finance tools, Marketing tools, Business tools, AWS etc.


Requirements


	Bachelors or master’s degree in computer science, Mathematics, Electrical Engineering or related field
	5+ years of experience working with NodeJS
	Comfort working within agile methodologies and experienced in estimation and time management
	Intermediate understanding of unit and integration testing, and testing frameworks/libraries — Mocha, Jest etc
	Strong preference for test-driven-development (TDD) and understanding its importance
	Experience having worked with at least one Web Framework for your language of choice
	Comfort and familiarity with code editor and formatting tools
	Familiarity with at least one web server technology — (ex: Apache, Nginx)
	Working knowledge of at least one CI/CD tool — Jenkins, Travis CI, Circle CI, GitHub Action
	Working knowledge of GRPC and protocol buffers
	Strong ability to problem-solve, debug, and understand pertinent performance metrics
	Familiarity with containerization infrastructure (Docker), Caching (Redis), API gateway (KrakenD), orchestration (Kubernetes), Distributed tracing (Jaeger), Service mesh (LinkerD) and observability
	Knowledge of microservices (or SOA), Docker, and/or distributed systems.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their resume and portfolio to: hr@youverify.co using "Software Engineer Backend" as the subject of the email.

Note: Applications without a portfolio will not be considered.
